spirit:component.spirit:name: top_axi_pcie_0_0

spirit:register.spirit:name: PCIe_cfg_space_header
spirit:register.spirit:description: Accessing The PCIe configuring space,

spirit:register.spirit:name: VSEC_Capability_Register
spirit:register.spirit:description: Provides capability ID version and next capability Offset,

spirit:field.spirit:name: VSEC_Capability_ID
spirit:field.spirit:description: PCI-SIG Defined ID identitfying this enhanced capability as a vendor-specific capability. Hardcoded to 0x000B.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Capability_Version
spirit:field.spirit:description: Version of this capability structure. Hardcoded to 0x1.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Next_Capability_Offset
spirit:field.spirit:description: Offset to next capability. Hardcoded to 0x0200.

spirit:register.spirit:name: VSEC_Header_Register
spirit:register.spirit:description: Provides unique identifier for the layout and contents of the VSEC structure, as its revision and length.

spirit:field.spirit:name: VSEC_ID
spirit:field.spirit:description: ID value uniquely identifying the nature and format of this VSEC structure. Hardcoded to 0x0001.

spirit:field.spirit:name: VSEC_REV
spirit:field.spirit:description: Version of this this capability structure. Hardcoded to 0x0.

spirit:field.spirit:name: VSEC_Length
spirit:field.spirit:description: Length of the entire VSEC capability structure, in bytes, including the VSEC capability register. Hardcoded to 0x038.

spirit:register.spirit:name: Bridge_info
spirit:register.spirit:description: Provides general configuration information about AXI4-Stream Bridge.

spirit:field.spirit:name: gen2_capable
spirit:field.spirit:description: If set, underlying integrated block supports GEN2 speed

spirit:field.spirit:name: root_port_present
spirit:field.spirit:description: Indicates the underlying integrated block is a Root Port when this bit is set.

spirit:field.spirit:name: up_config_capable
spirit:field.spirit:description: Indicates the underlying integrated block is capable when this bit is set.

spirit:field.spirit:name: ECAM_size
spirit:field.spirit:description: Size of the Enhanced configuration Access Mechanism (ECAM) Bus Number field, in number of bits. If ECAM window is present, value is between 1 and 8. if not present, value is 0.

spirit:register.spirit:name: Bridge_status_control
spirit:register.spirit:description: Provides info how read and writes to the core config access aperture are handled

spirit:field.spirit:name: ECAM_Busy
spirit:field.spirit:description: Indicates an ECAM access is in progress. This bit is tied to 0.

spirit:field.spirit:name: global_disable
spirit:field.spirit:description: when set disables interrupts line from being asserted. doesn't prevents bits in interrupt decode register from being set.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Read_Write_1_to_clear_as_Read_Write
spirit:field.spirit:description: When set, allows writing to the core registers which are normally Read and Write 1 to clear.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Read_only_as_Read_Write
spirit:field.spirit:description: When set, allows writing to the certain registers which are normally Read only. only for 7 series and zynq-7000 device cores.

spirit:register.spirit:name: interrupt_decode_register
spirit:register.spirit:description: provide info where Host processor ISR can determine what cause interrupt to be asserted and how to clear it.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Link_down
spirit:field.spirit:description: show link-up on PCIe Link was lost. not asserted unless linkup had previously been seen.

spirit:field.spirit:name: ECRC_Error
spirit:field.spirit:description: Indicates the received packet failed the ECRC check.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Straming_Error
spirit:field.spirit:description: Indicates a gap was encountered in a streamed packet on the Tx interface.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Hot_Reset
spirit:field.spirit:description: indicates a hot reset was detected.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Cfg_Completion_Status
spirit:field.spirit:description: indicates Cfg Completion Status.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Cfg_Timeout
spirit:field.spirit:description: indicates timeout on an ECAM mechanism access. applicable for RP only.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Correctable
spirit:field.spirit:description: indicates correctable error msg was received. Applicable for RP only

spirit:field.spirit:name: Non_Fatal
spirit:field.spirit:description: indicates Non-Fatal error msg was received. Applicable for RP only

spirit:field.spirit:name: Fatal
spirit:field.spirit:description: indicates Fatal error msg was received. Applicable for RP only

spirit:field.spirit:name: Intx_interrupt_received
spirit:field.spirit:description: indicates Intx interrupt was received. Applicable for RP only

spirit:field.spirit:name: MSI_interrupt_received
spirit:field.spirit:description: indicates MSI(x) interrupt was received. Applicable for RP only

spirit:field.spirit:name: Slave_Unsupported_request
spirit:field.spirit:description: indicates that a completion TLP was received with status 0b001- unsupported request.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Slave_Unexpected_completion
spirit:field.spirit:description: indicates that a completion TLP was received that was unexpected.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Slave_Completion_timeout
spirit:field.spirit:description: indicates that a completion TLP for a read request for PCIe was not returned within C_COMP_TIMEOUT parameter.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Slave_Error_poison
spirit:field.spirit:description: indicates that error poison[EP] bit was set in a completion TLP.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Slave_completer_abort
spirit:field.spirit:description: indicates that completion TLP was received with status of 0b100-completer abort.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Slave_Illegal_burst
spirit:field.spirit:description: indicates that Burst type other than INCR was requested by AXI master.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Master_Decerr
spirit:field.spirit:description: Indicates a Decoder Error response was received.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Master_Slverr
spirit:field.spirit:description: Indicates a slaveError response was received.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Master_Error_Poison
spirit:field.spirit:description: Indicates an EP bit was set in a Memory Write TLP from PCIe.

spirit:register.spirit:name: Interrupt_mask_register
spirit:register.spirit:description: control whether interrupt source can cause the interrupt line to be asserted.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Link_down
spirit:field.spirit:description: enables interrupt for Link down events when bit is set.

spirit:field.spirit:name: ECRC_Error
spirit:field.spirit:description: Enables interrupts for ECRC Error events when bit is set.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Straming_Error
spirit:field.spirit:description: Enables interrupts for Streaming Error events when bit is set.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Hot_Reset
spirit:field.spirit:description: enables interrupt for hot reset events when bit is set[writable for EP else =0]

spirit:field.spirit:name: Cfg_Completion_Status
spirit:field.spirit:description: enables interrupt for Cfg Completion Status events when bit is set[writable for RP else =0]

spirit:field.spirit:name: Cfg_Timeout
spirit:field.spirit:description: enables interrupt for cfg timeout events when bit is set[writable for RP else =0]

spirit:field.spirit:name: Correctable
spirit:field.spirit:description: enables interrupt for correctable events when bit is set[writable for RP else =0]

spirit:field.spirit:name: Non_Fatal
spirit:field.spirit:description: enables interrupt for non-fatal events when bit is set[writable for RP else =0]

spirit:field.spirit:name: Fatal
spirit:field.spirit:description: enables interrupt for fatal events when bit is set[writable for RP else =0]

spirit:field.spirit:name: Intx_interrupt_received
spirit:field.spirit:description: enables interrupt for intx interrupt events when bit is set[writable for RP else =0]

spirit:field.spirit:name: MSI_interrupt_received
spirit:field.spirit:description: enables interrupt for MSI interrupt events when bit is set[writable for RP else =0]

spirit:field.spirit:name: Slave_Unsupported_request
spirit:field.spirit:description: enables the slave unsupported request interrupt events when bit is set

spirit:field.spirit:name: Slave_Unexpected_completion
spirit:field.spirit:description: enables the slave unexpected completion interrupt when bit is set

spirit:field.spirit:name: Slave_Completion_timeout
spirit:field.spirit:description: enables the slave completion timeout interrupt when bit is set

spirit:field.spirit:name: Slave_Error_poison
spirit:field.spirit:description: enables the slave completion poison interrupt when bit is set

spirit:field.spirit:name: Slave_completer_abort
spirit:field.spirit:description: enables the slave completion abort interrupt when bit is set

spirit:field.spirit:name: Slave_Illegal_burst
spirit:field.spirit:description: enables the slave illegal burst interrupt when bit is set

spirit:field.spirit:name: Master_Decerr
spirit:field.spirit:description: enables a master DECERR interrupt when bit is set.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Master_Slverr
spirit:field.spirit:description: enables a master SLVERR interrupt when bit is set.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Master_Error_Poison
spirit:field.spirit:description: Enables a master Error Poison interrupt when bit is set.

spirit:register.spirit:name: bus_location_register
spirit:register.spirit:description: report the busdevice and function number and the port number for PCIe port.

spirit:field.spirit:name: function_number
spirit:field.spirit:description: function number for the port for PCIe. hard wired to 0.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Device_number
spirit:field.spirit:description: device number of port for pcie for EP and this is set by RP.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Bus_number
spirit:field.spirit:description: bus number for the port for PCIe. this is set by RP.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Port_number
spirit:field.spirit:description: sets the port number field of the link capabilities register EP- Read only on all devices except for Spartan-6 FPGA RP- Read and writable

spirit:register.spirit:name: Phy_status_control_register
spirit:register.spirit:description: provide the status current PHY state as well as control of speed and rate switching for gen2 capable.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Link_Rate
spirit:field.spirit:description: Reports the current link rate. 0 - 2.5 GT/s 1 - 5.0 GT/s

spirit:field.spirit:name: Link_Width
spirit:field.spirit:description: Reports the current link width. 00 = x1, 01 =x2, 10 =x4, 11 =x8.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Ltssm_State
spirit:field.spirit:description: Report the current LTSSM state.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Lane_Reversal
spirit:field.spirit:description: Report the current lane reversal mode. 00b - no lane reversal 01b - Lane 1:0 reversed 10b - Lane 3:0 reversed 11b - Lane 7:0 reversed

spirit:field.spirit:name: Link_Up
spirit:field.spirit:description: Reports the current PHY link up state. 1 = link up, 0 = link down

spirit:field.spirit:name: Directed_Link_Width
spirit:field.spirit:description: Specifies the completer link width for a directed link change operation. Only acted on when Directed link change specifies a width change. 00 = x1, 01 =x2, 10 =x4, 11 =x8.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Directed_Link_Speed
spirit:field.spirit:description: Specifies the completer speed width for a directed link change operation. Only acted on when Directed link change specifies a width change. 0b = 2.5 GT/s, 1b = 5.0 GT/s.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Directed_Link_Autonomous
spirit:field.spirit:description: Specifies width reliability or autonomous for a directed link change operation. 0b = Link Reliability, 1b = Autonomous.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Directed_Link_Change
spirit:field.spirit:description: Directs LTSSM to initiate a link width or speed change. 00b - No change. 01b - Force link width. 10b - Force link speed. 11b - Force link width and speed.

spirit:register.spirit:name: Root_Port_status_control_register
spirit:register.spirit:description: provide the access to the RP specific status and control. applicable for RP for non-RP cores it return 0 and writes are ignored.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Bridge_Enable
spirit:field.spirit:description: when set allows read/write to axibar. RP software nned to write 1 to this bit when enumeration is done. Bridge clear this when Link up to Link down tarnsition. Default is set to 0.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Error_FIFO_not_empty
spirit:field.spirit:description: Indicates that the Root port error FIFO has data to read.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Error_FIFO_overflow
spirit:field.spirit:description: Indicates that the Root port error FIFO overflowed and an error msg was dropped. writing 1 clears the overflow status.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Interrupt_FIFO_not_empty
spirit:field.spirit:description: Indicates that the Root port interrupt FIFO has data to read.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Interrupt_FIFO_overflow
spirit:field.spirit:description: Indicates that the Root port interrupt FIFO overflowed and an interrupt msg was dropped. writting 1 to clear the overflow status.

spirit:register.spirit:name: Root_Port_MSI_base_register_1
spirit:register.spirit:description: provide the access to the RP specific status and control. applicable for RP for non-RP cores it return 0 and writes are ignored.

spirit:field.spirit:name: MSI_Base
spirit:field.spirit:description: 4Kb alligned address for MSI interrupt. In case of 32 bit MSI, it returns 0 but captures upper 32 bits of the MSI address in case of 64 bit MSI.

spirit:register.spirit:name: Root_Port_MSI_base_register_2
spirit:register.spirit:description: sets the address window in RP cores used for MSI interrupts. MemWr TLP to address in this range are interpreted as MSI interrupt.

spirit:field.spirit:name: MSI_Base
spirit:field.spirit:description: 4K alligned address for MSI interrupt.

spirit:register.spirit:name: Root_Port_error_FIFO_read_register
spirit:register.spirit:displayName: Root Port error FIFO read register
spirit:register.spirit:description: reads from this location return a queued error(correctable/Non-fatal/Fatal) messages.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Requester_ID
spirit:field.spirit:description: Requester ID belonging to the requester of the error message

spirit:field.spirit:name: Error_Type
spirit:field.spirit:description: Indicates the type of error 00b: correctable, 01b: Non-fatal, 10b: Fatal.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Error_Valid
spirit:field.spirit:description: Indicates whether read succeeded 1b: success, 0b: no message to read.

spirit:register.spirit:name: Root_Port_interrupt_FIFO_read_register_1
spirit:register.spirit:displayName: Root Port interrupt FIFO read register 1
spirit:register.spirit:description: Read from this location return queued interrupt msg. for MSI interrupt payload present in RP interrupt FIFO read 2 register.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Requester_ID
spirit:field.spirit:description: Requester ID belonging to the requester of the error message

spirit:field.spirit:name: MSI_Address
spirit:field.spirit:description: for MSI interrupts, contain address bits 12:2 from TLP address field.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Interrupt_Line
spirit:field.spirit:description: Indicate interrupt line is used. 00b = INTA, 01b = INTB, 10b = INTC, 11b = INTD. For MSI this field is set to 00b.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Interrupt_Assert
spirit:field.spirit:description: Interrupt Assert or deassert for INTx. 1b = assert, 0b = deassert

spirit:field.spirit:name: MSI_Interrupt
spirit:field.spirit:description: indicates whether interrupt is MSI or INTx. 1b = MSI, 0b = INTx

spirit:field.spirit:name: Interrupt_Valid
spirit:field.spirit:description: indicates whether read succeeded. 1b: success, 0b: no interrupt to read

spirit:register.spirit:name: Root_Port_interrupt_FIFO_read_register_2
spirit:register.spirit:displayName: Root Port interrupt FIFO read register 2
spirit:register.spirit:description: Read from this location return queued interrupt msg. for MSI interrupt payload present in RP in this register.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Message_Data
spirit:field.spirit:description: payload for MSI messages

spirit:register.spirit:name: VSEC_Capability_register_2
spirit:register.spirit:description: VSEC capability register allows the memory space for the core to appear as though it is part of underlying PCIe configuration space.

spirit:field.spirit:name: VSEC_Capability_ID
spirit:field.spirit:description: PCI-SG defined ID identifying this enhanced capability as a Vendor-specific cabalility. HARDCODED to 0x000b

spirit:field.spirit:name: Capability_Version
spirit:field.spirit:description: Version of this capability structure. HARDCODED to 0x01b

spirit:field.spirit:name: Next_Capability_offset
spirit:field.spirit:description: offset of next capabilties.

spirit:register.spirit:name: VSEC_Header_register_2
spirit:register.spirit:description: provides a unique identifier for the layout and contents of the VSEC structure as well as revision and length.

spirit:field.spirit:name: VSEC_ID
spirit:field.spirit:description: ID value identifying the nature and format of this VSEC structure.

spirit:field.spirit:name: VSEC_REV
spirit:field.spirit:description: Version of this capability structure. Hardcoded to 0x0

spirit:field.spirit:name: VSEC_Lenght
spirit:field.spirit:description: Length of entire VSEC structure in bytes. Hardcoded to 0x038

spirit:register.spirit:name: AXIBAR2PCIEBAR_0U
spirit:register.spirit:description: When BAR is 64 bit address space, then most significant 32 bits are written into it for BAR 1.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Upper_Address
spirit:field.spirit:description: To create address for PCIe- this is the value substituted for the most significant 32 bits for the AXI address.

spirit:register.spirit:name: AXIBAR2PCIEBAR_0L
spirit:register.spirit:description: When BAR is 32 bit address space, then address translation vector is placed nto it for BAR 1.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Lower_Address
spirit:field.spirit:description: To create address for PCIe- this is the value substituted for the least significant 32 bits for the AXI address.

spirit:register.spirit:name: AXIBAR2PCIEBAR_2U
spirit:register.spirit:description: When BAR is 64 bit address space, then most significant 32 bits are written into it for BAR 2.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Upper_Address
spirit:field.spirit:description: To create address for PCIe- this is the value substituted for the most significant 32 bits for the AXI address.

spirit:register.spirit:name: AXIBAR2PCIEBAR_2L
spirit:register.spirit:description: When BAR is 32 bit address space, then address translation vector is placed nto it for BAR 2.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Lower_Address
spirit:field.spirit:description: To create address for PCIe- this is the value substituted for the least significant 32 bits for the AXI address.

spirit:register.spirit:name: AXIBAR2PCIEBAR_3U
spirit:register.spirit:description: When BAR is 64 bit address space, then most significant 32 bits are written into it for BAR 3.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Upper_Address
spirit:field.spirit:description: To create address for PCIe- this is the value substituted for the most significant 32 bits for the AXI address.

spirit:register.spirit:name: AXIBAR2PCIEBAR_3L
spirit:register.spirit:description: When BAR is 32 bit address space, then address translation vector is placed nto it for BAR 3.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Lower_Address
spirit:field.spirit:description: To create address for PCIe- this is the value substituted for the least significant 32 bits for the AXI address.

spirit:register.spirit:name: AXIBAR2PCIEBAR_4U
spirit:register.spirit:description: When BAR is 64 bit address space, then most significant 32 bits are written into it for BAR 4.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Upper_Address
spirit:field.spirit:description: To create address for PCIe- this is the value substituted for the most significant 32 bits for the AXI address.

spirit:register.spirit:name: AXIBAR2PCIEBAR_4L
spirit:register.spirit:description: When BAR is 32 bit address space, then address translation vector is placed nto it for BAR 4.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Lower_Address
spirit:field.spirit:description: To create address for PCIe- this is the value substituted for the least significant 32 bits for the AXI address.

spirit:register.spirit:name: AXIBAR2PCIEBAR_5U
spirit:register.spirit:description: When BAR is 64 bit address space, then most significant 32 bits are written into it for BAR 5.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Upper_Address
spirit:field.spirit:description: To create address for PCIe- this is the value substituted for the most significant 32 bits for the AXI address.

spirit:register.spirit:name: AXIBAR2PCIEBAR_5L
spirit:register.spirit:description: When BAR is 32 bit address space, then address translation vector is placed nto it for BAR 5.

spirit:field.spirit:name: Lower_Address
spirit:field.spirit:description: To create address for PCIe- this is the value substituted for the least significant 32 bits for the AXI address.

spirit:enumeration.spirit:text: Root Port of PCI Express Root Complex
Device was built before Class Code definitions were finalized

spirit:component.spirit:description: The Advanced eXtensible Interface (AXI) Root Port/Endpoint (RP/EP) Bridge for PCI Express is an interface between the AXI4 and PCI Express

xilinx:coreExtensions.xilinx:displayName: AXI Memory Mapped To PCI Express
